full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB BDE LAM GYI DMIGS SKOR CHA TSANG BAR TSIGS BCAD DU BSDEBS PA LAM MCHOG SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI SNGAR BYANG CHUB BDE LAM GYI DON TSIGS BCAD DU BSDEBS BZHIN TU NYUNG NGU ZHIG BRIS YOD PA DE LAS CUNG ZAD RGYAS PA ZHIG DGOS TSUL, BA RON SU NYID SHOG NAS DANG BRTZON BLO GROS KYI NOR DANG LDAN ZHING SGRUB PA LA GA ZHOL BA GU SHRI BLO BZANG DKON MCHOG GIS BSKUL BA LTAR, DON TSAN GAL CHE BA DU MAS ZUR BSKANGS TE, ^ ,BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON MES DBEN GNAS YID DGA' CHOS 'DZIN DU BRIS PA'O,, ,,) 'JIG RTEN GSUM NA DKON @014B PA'I YID BZHIN NOR, ,RMAD BYUNG LEGS BSHAD CHOS KYI MCHOD SBYIN MCHOG ,SPEL BA'I DGE BAS 'BREL THOGS LUS CAN KUN, ,RING MIN RNAMo MKHYEN RGYAL BA'I GNAS THOB SHOG ,(CES PA 'DI NI BA RON SU NYID SHOG GI PHUL BYUNG YON TAN TSOGS KYIS MTHO BA ZHABS DRUNG DKON MCHOG RNAM RGYAL GYIS 'DI NYID BAR DU BSGRUBS PA'I TSE, ^BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON MES BRIS PA'O, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
